headline.main: Sentence of the Week: Six-Pack-Tax Edition

docs.abstract: I'm in love with the phrase "six-pack tax" and am going to start using it about everything I spend money on: groceries, health insurance, Netflix, charity, French fries, gardening supplies, foreign-language-learning software. It's all, in one way or another, part of an elaborate, massive, lifelong excise program designed to one day, somehow, get myself a six-pack.
